column4: Can someone help me login to gnome? I have to use the failsafe option to do it now. the following errir is in .xsessions-errors Executing /usr/bin/gnome-session failed, will try to run x-terminal-emulator
Is my problem too hard to solve? Should I just reinstall ubuntu? My problem is that I can't login to gnome without the failsafe session
i think the problem is insufficient information. what did you do that you can no longer login?
I installed the latest nvidia drivers when this happened. I already tried uninstalling them, compiz, and did a dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
